analysis.description:
PPTL_PrivateCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/45/0x4d69a676983b3873ba04aa5bac89aa1824f09302.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/45/0x4d69a676983b3873ba04aa5bac89aa1824f09302.sol)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/45/0x4d69a676983b3873ba04aa5bac89aa1824f09302.sol#487-491) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x4d69a676983b3873ba04aa5bac89aa1824f09302.sol#491)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/45/0x4d69a676983b3873ba04aa5bac89aa1824f09302.sol#563-570) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.saleTokens(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x4d69a676983b3873ba04aa5bac89aa1824f09302.sol#565-570)
